alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 29 at 8:47AM EDT until June 30 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27) affecting Taylor, Madison and Jefferson Counties. For the Aucilla River...including Lamont (US 27)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27). * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 53.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 53.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM EDT Thursday was 53.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 51.6 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 53.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 53.3 feet on 12/07/1976. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
